primarySegments.name: Young Urban Professionals
primarySegments.description: Tech-savvy young professionals living in urban areas who prioritize safety and quick response in emergencies.

problemsNeeds: Need quick and reliable emergency alert system
Concerned about personal safety in urban environments
behaviors: Quick to download and test new apps
Likely to share app with peers
Use app during travel or night outings

primarySegments.name: Elderly Individuals
primarySegments.description: Older adults who live independently and require a reliable method to alert family or caregivers in case of emergencies.

problemsNeeds: Need for a simple emergency alert system
Fear of being unable to communicate in emergencies
Require reassurance for themselves and family
behaviors: May need assistance setting up app
Rely on app for peace of mind

primarySegments.name: Parents of Young Children
primarySegments.description: Parents who are concerned about the safety of their children and seek a reliable way to ensure their well-being.

problemsNeeds: Need to ensure children's safety during outings
Desire for peace of mind when apart from children
behaviors: May teach children to use app
